author: terence0083
content: I've notified that nethermind and ethereumjs will return an error when passing zeros to `safe_block_hash`. Besides the consensus spec, there's nowhere else that specifies safe block hash could be zeros before the first justification event.  Should we specify that in https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-3675#pos-events ? <@425572898787426305>

author: m.kalinin
content: `safe_block_hash` isn't a part of consensus, thus, shouldn't be in the EIP. I think we may specify it in the Engine API
